Translations.Text: Sorede kono hi kare wa, soko ni tomo wa naku
mata, kegarawashi fuhai-mono no soto ni shokumotsu wanai
sore o taberu no wa, tsumibito dakedearu
Ware wa, anata gataga mi eru mono ni oite chikai
mata anata gataga mi enai mono ni oite chikau
Hontoni kore wa, sonkina shito no kotobadearu
Kore wa shijin no kotobade wanai. Daga anata gata wa, hotondo shinjinai
Mata, uranaishi no kotoba demonai. Shikashi anata gata wa hotondo ki ni moshi nai
(Koreha) ban'yu no nushi kara kudasa reta keijidearu
Moshi kare (shito) ga, ware ni kanshite nanrakano kotoba o netsuzo surunaraba
ware wa kitto kare no migite o torae
kare no keidomyaku o kanarazu kirudearou
Anata gata no naka, darehitori, kare o mamotte yarenai nodearu
Hontoni kore wa,-nushi o osoreru mono e no kunkaidearu
Ware wa anata gata no naka,(sore o) kyohi suru mono o shiru
Hontoni kono (kuruan) wa, fushin-sha ni totte wa kanashimi (no tane)dearou
Daga sore wa, hontoni kakkotaru fudo no shinridearu
Dakara shidainaru okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Aru mono ga, kudarubeki chobatsu ni tsuite tou
Fushinjin-sha wa, sore o fusegu koto wa dekinai
Kaidan no shu, arra kara (no chobatsu)dearu
Tenshi-tachi ya seirei (dai tenshi jiburiru) wa, tsuitachi ni shite, kare no moto ni noboru, sono (tsuitachi no) naga-sa wa, 5 man-nendearu
Dakara anata wa, rippa ni taeshinobe
Hontoni kare-ra wa, sore (Ni~Tsu) o toi to omou
Shikashi ware wa, sore o chikai to miru
Ten ga toketa do no yo ni naru hi
yamayama wa, suita yomo no yo ni nari
dare mo tomo (no anpi) o tou koto wanai
